title: The business of TikTok trends
itunes:title: The business of TikTok trends
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: There’s promise and peril on the For You page. On today’s show, we’ll look at how companies cash in or miss out on the big TikTok trends — and why some of those viral fads aren’t as spontaneous as they look. But first: the dust-up over chip exports to China, the Volatility Index and the latest productivity numbers.
